amendment.description: To increase funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3014 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3014 proposed by Senator Chafee. (consideration: CR S2072-2074, S2093-2094; text: CR S2072) To increase funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3014 proposed by Senator Chafee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3014 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
